mapper.select: select c.`manager_id` as manager_id, cp.`client_id` as client_id, cp.`product_id` as product_id, cp.`latest_recharge_id` as recharge_id, r.`end_date` as end_date from `client_product` cp inner join `recharge` r on cp.`latest_recharge_id` = r.`id` left join `client` c on cp.`client_id` = c.`id` left join `client_remind_product` crp on r.`id` = crp.`recharge_id` where crp.`remind` is null and r.`bill_plan` = 1 and r.`end_date` >= #{before} and r.`end_date` < #{after}

select c.`manager_id` as manager_id, cp.`client_id` as client_id, cp.`product_id` as product_id, cp.`latest_recharge_id` as recharge_id from `client_product` cp inner join `recharge` r on cp.`latest_recharge_id` = r.`id` left join `client` c on cp.`client_id` = c.`id` left join `client_remind_product` crp on r.`id` = crp.`recharge_id` where crp.`remind` is null and r.`bill_plan` != 1 and cp.`balance` <= #{amount}
